/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. A few trees punctuate the scene, adding a touch of green to the concrete jungle. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the photograph.
